title: PayForeign
subtitle: International payment gateway platform
shortDescription: Facilitating cross-border transactions and currency conversions with competitive rates.
fullDescription: A comprehensive international payment gateway platform that facilitates cross-border transactions with competitive exchange rates and low fees. The system integrates with multiple banking APIs and provides real-time transaction tracking.

title: Ondepay Virtual Card V2
subtitle: Digital payment solution
shortDescription: Enhanced virtual card system with improved user experience and advanced security features.
fullDescription: Next-generation virtual card solution with enhanced security features and improved user experience. The platform supports instant card generation, spending limits, and merchant restrictions.
